summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx detailing shipping charges for services rendered to J Epstein & Co Inc. The invoice includes various transportation charges, special handling fees, and details about the shipments made by Jeffrey Epstein and his associates. It highlights the financial transactions related to shipping services over a specified period.

keyFacts: The invoice details shipping charges totaling $453.70 for services rendered to J Epstein & Co Inc.
Multiple packages were shipped and delivered to various recipients associated with Jeffrey Epstein.
The document includes specific dates of package pickups and deliveries, indicating active shipping operations.
There are mentions of temporary fuel surcharges applied to the shipping costs due to market conditions.
Several named individuals are associated with the shipping activities, indicating potential business or personal relationships.
